titles.title: To direct the President to renew the membership of the United States in the United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO).

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.
Referred to the Subcommittee on International Operations and Human Rights.

bill.summary: 7/20/1999--Introduced. Directs the President to take all necessary steps to renew U.S. membership in the United Nations Educational, Scientific, and Cultural Organization (UNESCO). Authorizes appropriations for each fiscal year for payment of assessed and voluntary contributions to UNESCO.
